data.lyric:
[ti:New Soul]
[ar:Yael Naïm]
[al:Yael Naim]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]New Soul - Yael Naïm
[00:04.61]Written by：Yael Naïm
[00:09.22]I'm a new soul
[00:10.97]I came to this strange world hoping
[00:13.88]I could learn a bit about how to give and take
[00:17.31]
[00:18.61]But since I came here
[00:20.58]Felt the joy and the fear
[00:22.92]Finding myself making every possible mistake
[00:26.73]
[00:28.29]La la la la la la la la
[00:36.78]
[00:47.72]I'm a young soul in this very strange world
[00:51.72]Hoping I could learn a bit about what is true and fake
[00:55.95]
[00:56.90]But why all this hate
[00:58.99]Try to communicate
[01:00.12]
[01:01.40]Finding trust and love is not always easy to make
[01:05.50]
[01:06.69]La la la la la la la la
[01:16.62]
[01:46.03]This is a happy end
[01:47.84]
[01:50.66]Cause' you don't understand everything you have done
[01:58.54]
[02:00.20]Why's everything so wrong
[02:02.84]
[02:05.00]This is a happy end
[02:06.75]
[02:07.49]Come and give me your hand
[02:09.19]
[02:09.83]I'll take your far away
[02:12.11]

[02:15.23]
